name: Lightning Stiletto
description:
Combat Action: Switch your Keqing in to be the active character and immediately use Stellar Restoration once. This instance of Stellar Restoration will grant Keqing Electro Infusion without creating another Lightning Stiletto.
(When Keqing uses Stellar Restoration with this card in Hand: Instead of creating another Lightning Stiletto, Discard this card and Keqing gains Electro Infusion)
descriptionraw: $[K1]: Switch your $[A1403] in to be the active character and immediately use $[S14032] once. This instance of $[S14032] will grant $[A1403] <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1002]</color> without creating another Lightning Stiletto.\n(When $[A1403] uses $[S14032] with this card in Hand: Instead of creating another Lightning Stiletto, $[K56] this card and $[A1403] gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1002]</color>)
